name: Polygondwanaland
overview:
Feel the awesome power of the Gizz in 8-bit chiptune!

This is no ordinary NES cartridge, this is King Gizzard & the Lizard Wizard's Polygondwanaland transformed into 8-bit chiptune by the legendary 8-Bit Escapades. Prepare to be transported to a dream world filled with crumbling castles, eerie jungles, and the ninth circle of hell! Think you're up to the adventure? Then place this NES Game Pak in your NES console and let it rip.

With this NES cartridge release, you will begin your initiation into the 21st century. It will rock you into the fringe of a new scientific era and transmit you electronically into the thoughts and world of King Gizzard & the Lizard Wizard. Don't let your fear of the unknown restrict you - technology cannot, and will not, be stopped.

As a free extra, this NES Game Pak includes thirteen additional chiptune versions of your other favorite Gizz records by 8-Bit Escapades! We have also included several secret easter eggs where you can win free goodies from you release vault or listen to a hidden tune: Head On/Pill. Unlock the hidden tune by paying respect to the ancient legend Konami.
